rules.natural: If the technology team develops diagnostic software, then the treatment program is successful.
Under the condition that patient data is monitored for alcohol consumption, if the treatment program is not successful, then alcohol dependency is treated with a medication plan.
Provided that the monitoring system integrates with the EHR platform, the alert system detects high-risk patterns.
Either the monitoring system integrates with the EHR platform or patient data is analyzed for consumption trends.
Whenever patient data is analyzed for consumption trends, patient data is monitored for alcohol consumption.
If the hospital implements treatment protocols, then the treatment program is successful.
Under the condition that the medical board approves protocol changes, the administrator allocates treatment resources.
Provided that the chief physician authorizes treatment plans, the hospital implements treatment protocols.
If the quality team evaluates treatment outcomes, then either the medical board approves protocol changes or the chief physician authorizes treatment plans.
Either the research committee reviews study proposals or the quality team evaluates treatment outcomes.
Whenever medical staff are trained in diagnostic skills, the treatment program is successful.
If the server processes real-time data, then should the analytics engine generate risk assessments, if the treatment program is not successful, the alert system escalates critical cases.

Either the system violates data protection or the system does not comply with privacy regulations.
Either the project achieves implementation goals or either the technology team develops diagnostic software or medical staff are trained in diagnostic skills.
Under the condition that the project misses deadlines, the project does not achieve implementation goals.
Either the project misses deadlines or the project exceeds the budget.
Provided that the project exceeds the budget, the project does not achieve implementation goals.
If the technology team completes the development phase, then the technology team develops diagnostic software.
Under the condition that diagnostic software requires algorithm updates, the technology team develops diagnostic software.
Either diagnostic software requires algorithm updates or medical staff require diagnostic skills.
Whenever the training team completes staff training, medical staff are trained in diagnostic skills.
If medical staff fail certification, then medical staff require retraining.
Under the condition that medical staff require retraining, medical staff do not pass the competency test.
If the physician administers withdrawal medication, then alcohol dependency is treated with a medication plan.
Under the condition that the doctor prescribes a treatment regimen, the nurse supervises medication administration.
Whenever the nurse supervises medication administration, medical staff monitor patient response.
Provided that the audit system detects protocol deviations, then if the monitoring system logs medication errors, the incident system reports adverse events.
Either the audit system detects protocol deviations or compliance software flags violations.
Under the condition that compliance software flags violations, then if the monitoring system logs medication errors, the incident system reports adverse events.
If the backup system triggers emergency protocols, then the emergency team activates crisis response.
Provided that the backup system triggers emergency protocols, it is not the case that the emergency team activates crisis response.
Either the system operates in normal mode or the fallback system does not activate backup operations.
Under the condition that the system experiences hardware failure, the system does not operate in normal mode.
Either the system experiences hardware failure or the system switches to maintenance mode.
If the system switches to maintenance mode, then the system runs diagnostics.
If medical staff use diagnostic protocols, then medical staff are trained in diagnostic skills.
Provided that the system restores full operation, the system does not operate in normal mode.
Either the system maintains optimal performance or the redundant system does not engage in backup duties.
If the system protects sensitive information, then the system encrypts patient data.

Under the condition that the security team audits access logs, then if it is not the case that if the system violates data protection, the system protects sensitive information, then the compliance officer is not notified of a breach incident.

If the security team implements countermeasures, then the security team resolves security incidents.

Either the learning system updates risk models or if the risk algorithm analyzes patient history, then if the treatment program is not successful, the alert system escalates critical cases.
Either the system loses data connection or either the system syncs with cloud backup or if the server does not process real-time data, then the backup server stores encrypted data.
If the system recovers network access, then the system does not lose data connection.
Under the condition that the system restores full connectivity, the system synchronizes all data.
Either the batch system processes historical data or if the analytics engine generates risk assessments, then if the treatment program is not successful, the alert system escalates critical cases.
Provided that the system schedules a maintenance window, then if the batch system processes historical data, the batch system generates trend reports.
Under the condition that the system runs system updates, the system suspends non-essential services.
Whenever the system completes update installation, the system resumes normal operations.
